speaker: President.
english: President. – The next point on the Agenda is the report by Will Piecyk ( A6-0235/2007 ) on behalf of the Committee on the Environment, Public Health and Food Safety towards a future maritime Policy for the Union: a European vision for the oceans and seas ( 2006/2299(INI) )
original: President. – The next point on the Agenda is the report by Will Piecyk ( A6-0235/2007 ) on behalf of the Committee on the Environment, Public Health and Food Safety towards a future maritime Policy for the Union: a European vision for the oceans and seas ( 2006/2299(INI) )
agenda_item: Towards a future Maritime Policy for the Union (debate)
